data.text: Avo, lekeni mbuli zose zihile, uvwizi, udelenya, migongo, na kuwalonga waenu vihile.
Kamba wana ving'hele, gasulukileni matombo ganogile ga muloho, giladi kubitila matombo higo mpate kukula muukombola.
Kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzilonga, “Mweye wenyego mulanza na kona kamba Mndewa kanoga.”
Izoni ha Mndewa, dibwe dili na ugima dilemigwe na wanhu kamba kinhu bule, ila disaguligwa na Mulungu kamba dibwe dili na hishima ng'hulu.

Na mweye vivija, mulinga na mabwe gali na ugima, mzengigwa muing'anda ya Mulungu ya muloho tena mweye mwa wakulu wa nhambiko mung'alile. Kubitila ugombelezi wa Yesu Kilisto molava nhosa ya muloho ija imnogela Mulungu.
Kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzilonga,
Kumwenu mweye mtogola, dibwe dino dina ugoli mkulu. Ila ha waja iwabezi, dibwe dino dabule ugoli wowose, kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzilonga,
Na Nyandiko ziyagwe Zing'alile zolonga,

Ila mweye mwa wanhu msaguligwe, wakulu wa nhambiko wa Mndewa, isi ing'alile, wanhu wa Mulungu, msaguligwe kuzipeta sang'hano za Mulungu, ayo yawakemile mweye kulawa mdiziza na kwingila mmulangaza wake wa mkanganyo.
Umwaka hamkalile wanhu wa Mulungu, ila sambi mwa wanhu zake. Na umwaka hamditangile bazi da Mulungu, ila sambi mdibokela bazi jake.
Mbwiga zangu wanogelwa, mweye kamba wahenza na wabita nzila muulumwengu uno, nowayalalila sambimziwinze sulukila za lukuli, azo zigomba na loho zenu.
Kaleni ukazi unogile hagatigati ya Wamhazi, hata kamba wowatagusa mweye kamba motenda gehile, wazone sang'hano zenu zinogile na wamuyenzi Mulungu mdizua dondayeze kuutagusa ulumwengu.
Sama ya Mndewa, uhishimileni kila utawala wa kiunhu. Mmuhishimile mtawala, ayo yali na udaho mkulu,
na watawala wadodo, awo wasaguligwe na heyo giladi wawasune waja wotenda gehile na kuwagwelela nhogolwa waja wotenda ganogile.
Kwavija Mulungu kowalonda mweye mzivudalize mbuli za ubozi za wanhu wabozi kubitila mbuli zinogile zumtenda.
Kaleni kamba wanhu wailegehe, ila sambimuutende ulegeho wenu uwe ngubiko ya kufisa mbuli zihile. Kaleni kamba nyakadala za Mulungu.
Muwahishimile wanhu wose, na muwanogele wanhu wamtogole Kilisto. Mdumbeni Mulungu, na mmuhishimile mtawala.
Mweye nyakadala, iweni wende ha wandewa zenu na kuwalagusila hishima yose, sio ha wandewa wanogile na waholile mioyo weiyeka, ila vivija ha awo iwakali.
Kwavija Mulungu konogelwa na mweye muhatenda gaja ganogile gomgatanga na kwazaganya mbuli hazilumbile zondamtendeligwe.
Ihawa mokwazaganya kipigiti muhatoigwa sama ya kutenda mbuli zihile, kinhu chaki chondampate? Ila kamba muhagazika sama ya kutenda mbuli zinogile na kwazaganya, Mulungu kowamoteza sama ya mbuli hizo.
Kwavija mkemigwa sama ya mbuli zino, mana Kilisto vivija kagazika sama yenu, kawalekela kilingilo, giladi mumkweleleze heyo.
“Heyo hatendile vilozo, na haduhu munhu yahulike mbuli za uvwizi kulawa mmulomo wake.”2:22 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha ISAYA 53:9.
Wanhu viwamuligile, heyo ham'bwelezele maligo munhu yoyose, na wanhu viwamgazile, heyo hamgazile munhu yoyose. Ila kadika tamanilo jake ha Mulungu, mulamula yalibule uzenzeleganye.
“Heyo mwenyego kavipapa vilozo vetu” mulukuli lwake mumsalaba, giladi mmbuli ya vilozo toneke kamba tudanganhika, na mmbuli zinogile toneke tuna ugima. “Na kubitila kutoigwa kuyatoigwe mweye muhona.”
Kwavija “mweye mkala kamba ng'hondolo wapotele,”2:25 Mbuli zino zololawa mkitabu cha ISAYA 53:4-6. ila sambi mum'bwelela Mchunga na Mwimilizi wa loho zenu.
